Package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.imports

Class AbstractImportRule

java.lang.Object
com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.imports.AbstractImportRule
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassImportRule, PkgImportRule
abstract class AbstractImportRule extends Object
Base class for import rules.

      allow - whether to allow access.
